welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Seligenstadt, a charming town known for its historic buildings, quaint shops, and warm hospitality. We hope you have a wonderful time exploring and experiencing all that our beautiful city has to offer."

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Frankfurt-Egelsbach Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Frankfurt-Egelsbach Airport, mostly used for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The largest and oldest terminal at Frankfurt International Airport, serving a variety of airlines and destinations.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A newer and smaller terminal at Frankfurt International Airport, primarily used by Lufthansa and its partner airlines.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free WiFi network for up to 4 hours per day.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Reichelsheim Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Reichelsheim Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport, free of charge.
